label: Constitution
flavor: You imbue the item with resilient constitution.
level-8-spell: The item can cast 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, on you only, once per day as a divine spell.
level-14-spell: The item can cast 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, on you only, once per day as a divine spell.
level-17-apex: When you invest the item, you either increase your Constitution attribute by +1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value. The item gains the apex trait.
level-18-spell: The item can either cast 7th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, on you only, once per day as a divine spell, or cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} on you once per day.
level-20-hp: If you rest for 10 minutes, you recover 100 Hit Points.
